description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Use gravitational forces as your weapon and defense in this insanely action packed physics based two stick shooter. Battle varied enemy types and upgrade your ship's abilities to cause more carnage.
